mapper.select: select jd.`job_name`, jd.`job_group`, jd.`job_class_name`, t.`trigger_name`, t.`trigger_group`, ct.`cron_expression`, ct.`time_zone_id` from qrtz_job_details as jd, qrtz_triggers as t, qrtz_cron_triggers as ct where jd.`job_name` = t.`job_name` and t.`trigger_name` = ct.`trigger_name` and t.`trigger_group` = ct.`trigger_group`
